item.title: Update issue
item.dc:creator: @mod_xtomx mod xtomx
item.description:
@mod_xtomx wrote:

Hello, I had this code to give a server message in yellow, saying something like (System Update in ___) It worked fine, and randomly I just quit working completely. I Need to get this working…

I have this code:

} if (command.startsWith("update") && (command.length() > 7) && (playerRights > 3)) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command .substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

I tried another code sombody gave me which was,

} if (playerCommand.startsWith("update")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); int a = Integer.parseInt(args[1]); PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = a; PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }

Top code allows me to compile and run the server just when I do ::update nothing happens. Bottom one wont allow me to start server without getting an error.

Read full topic
